Understandable.

I remember I had some Substitute teachers that literally stayed with us for like half the year.

I remember i had _two_ teachers that got Pregnant right behind each other.

Right after one had a baby the other one got Pregnant and left us with a Substitute for like half the year.

beer gets so rotten very fast.
